attributes.action: Call for the resignation of, or fire, Ken Jones
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The reported suggestion by Ken Jones, head of the Association of Chief Police Officers, that terrorism suspects should be detained essentially indefinitely, is so abhorrent that he should not be allowed to continue in his post. Such a power, if granted, would be abused, and lead to de-facto loss of both trial by jury and presumption of innocence until proof of guilt, with "terrorism" being given as an excuse instead of a true reason.
